snippet.title: With Friends Like These - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Team up with your pal to save the world from the playful chaos caused by your shipwrecked party friends in this 2D couch co-op adventure. Together you must share and swap controls, combining your abilities in the ultimate showcase of friendship.

Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3498890/With_Friends_Like_These/

Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/shykidsclub.com
Instagram - https://www.tiktok.com/@_shykidsclub
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@_shykidsclub
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/shykidsclub
